91  DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* getObject (const char* parameterName, int32_t oid) const;
92 
93  template <class T>
94  T* getObject (const char* parameterName, int32_t oid) const
95  {
96  if (oid == -1)
97  return NULL;
98 
99  DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* obj = getObject(parameterName, oid);
100 
101  T* r = dynamic_cast<T*>(obj);
102  if (r == NULL)
103  throw DepthSense::PArgumentException::create(parameterName, "type mismatch");
104 
105  return r;
106  }

119  struct ClientInformation
120  {
121  ClientInformation(int32_t major = 0, int32_t minor = 0, int32_t patch = 0, int32_t build = 0, bool isPublic = true, uint32_t reserved = 0)
122  : isPublic(isPublic), reserved(reserved)
123  {
124  version.major = major;
125  version.minor = minor;
126  version.patch = patch;
127  version.build = build;
128  }
129  bool isPublic;
130  uint32_t reserved;
131  DepthSense::Version version;
132  };
